Title: The Common Costume
Description:
I'll slip away after the recitation. It's easy to vanish in a crowd of earthen enjoying a keg of cinderbrew.

However, I can't be recognized when I leave town. I don't want anyone to stop me. Or worse, to think I'm abandoning my oath. Better to just disappear.

If you find me a spare set of Miner's Clothes, I'll be able to get away without being noticed.
ObjectivesText: Find a spare set of Miner's Clothes.
RewardText: Thank you. No one should recognize me in these.
